long description of Other Mini Widgets
Catalog1 Search Products - only products in this category will show up in a search in catalog1
For quick orders, you have found the right place!

Product.longDescription: This gizmo is very small and runs on solar power.
This is the original multi-colored gizmo, only available from OFBiz!

This gizmo only works in certain areas and requires a lot of extra space to move around.

*** WARNING: this gizmo is known to crash quite often and may malfunction or cease to function due to malicious misuse of certain features ***
A small round gizmo with multi-colored lights. Works great in the dark. Small and compact.
A large gizmo with legs. Walks on its own. Does not require a power supply.
The his/her gizmo is a perfect gift for your favorite couple. Once you try it out you'll want a set for yourself!
This micro chrome widget makes a perfect gift. This one is so small that it floats in air.
This tiny chrome widget makes a perfect gift. The shine will last forever. No pollishing required.
This giant widget is mobile. It will seat one person safely. The wheels will never rust or break. Quite a unique item.
This giant widget is mobile. It will seat one person safely. The wheels will never rust or break. Quite a unique item.
This giant widget is mobile. It will seat one person safely. The wheels will never rust or break. Quite a unique item.
This giant widget is mobile. It will seat one person safely. The wheels will never rust or break. Quite a unique item.
This giant widget is mobile. It will seat one person safely. The wheels will never rust or break. Quite a unique item.

If you like chrome, but want it a little bigger, this is the one for you!
A whole lot more features for the buck.
These two are much more useful together.

ProductPromo.promoText: Spend more than $100 on your favorite widgets and gizmos and get a free Micro Chrome Widget!
20% off any one item, either GZ-1005 (.NIT Gizmo) or GZ-1006 (Open Gizmo) with a limit of 1 per order

ProductPromo.promoName: Test percent off entire purchase, no condition

ProductPromo.promoText: $10 off entire purchase of $50 or more with promo code [9000], limit use of code to one per customer, limit for three uses total for the code

ProductPromo.promoName: Test buy X get Y free
ProductPromo.promoText: Buy 3 Get 2 Free in the Widgets [200] or any sub-category (except the Small Widgets [201] category and sub-categories, but always including the Micro Widgets [20111] category), limit to two per order

ProductPromo.promoName: Test buy X get Y at Z% discount
ProductPromo.promoText: Buy 1 Big Gizmo [GZ-8544] or Massive Gizmo [GZ-7000] Get 1 Purple Gizmo [GZ-5005] At 50% off with promo code [9001] (must be associated with Party or Email), no limit
Buy 4 items for $50 from Purple Gizmo [GZ-5005], Rainbow Gizmo [GZ-1004], Round Gizmo [GZ-2644] or Square Gizmo [GZ-2002] limit 2 per customer
Get $500 off any item in the Small Gizmos [101] category, limit 1 per order, 2 per customer, 3 for entire promotion promotion. Discount not to exceed the price of the item.

ProductPromo.promoName: Test Gift with Amount of Specific Product
ProductPromo.promoText: Buy $50 of your favorite gizmos (all products in Gizmo [100] or sub-category) get a free Open Gizmo! Limit 2 per order.

ProductPromo.promoName: Test Gift with Total Amount of Product
ProductPromo.promoText: Spend more than $150 on your favorite gizmos (all products in Gizmo [100] or sub-category) and get a free Open Gizmo!

ProductPromoRule.ruleName: GWP for Gizmos Only Not Counted
